code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import'slick-carousel/slick/slick.css';import'slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css';import axios from'axios';import{API_URL}from'../../config/contansts';import'./Main.scss';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MainBook=_ref=>{let{Genre}=_ref;const[axiosResult,setAxiosResult]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/api/book?book_genre=").concat(Genre,"&limit=5")).then(res=>{setAxiosResult(res.data);console.log("응답 데이터: ",res.data);}).catch(err=>{console.error(err);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-mid-container-lhs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main-mid-top-lhs",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:[Genre,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/booklist?genre=".concat(Genre),className:"more-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main-bottom-more-lhs",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"more-view-kjh",children:"\uB354 \uBCF4\uAE30+"})})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main-mid-img-lhs",children:axiosResult.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(NavLink,{to:"/BookDetail/".concat(item.book_id),className:"grid-item-lhs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:API_URL+item.book_img_url,alt:"grid".concat(index+1)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-text-lhs",children:item.book_name})]},index))})]});};export default MainBook;
